mapper.delete: delete from t_approval_process where process_id = #{arg0} and company_id = #{arg1}
mapper.select: select process_id, process_name, process_type, group_id, group_name, remarks, create_time, company_id from t_approval_process

select t1.process_id, t1.process_name, t1.process_type, t1.group_id, t1.group_name, t1.remarks, t1.create_time, t2.approver_id, t2.user_id, t2.user_name, t2.dept_name, t2.sort, t2.action_type from t_approval_process t1 left join t_process_approver t2 on t1. process_id = t2. process_id where t1.company_id = #{arg0} and t1.process_id = #{arg1} order by t1.process_id desc
